attributes.action: set local social and council housing rent levels according to cost and average wages of the tenants rather than equivalent commercial rents which are generally of a level which would purchase the property and do not take account of cost of property which was financed by the local community and was generally paid for many times over by the level of rent this means ordinary working people have to be subsidised by housing benefit which was paid for by council tax and income tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the government told local councils and housing associations to charge rents equivalent to local private rental this means that example i rent from a local housing association, the housing stock was paid for years ago they purchased the entire stock from the local council for eg 30million they receive in rent over 9 million per year most of the repairs and new builds are subsidised heavily by the housing corporation,local council etc which are taxpayer and council tax payer funded the association is non profit making but have expanded their empire hugely through finance based on rents, the original cost per property was £2500 approximately the current rents average£4000 per annum how can this not make a profit
